settings.textp: A refined expression of joy and romance.
settings.textarey: Attention to detail gets a whole new meaning with our intricate pavé work. During the sketching phase, we drew inspiration from important rings of past eras, and applied modern techniques to create a style that feels slightly vintage yet ever so modern.

settings.title: The Pavé Setting
settings.content: Inspired by vintage designs, our interpretation of pavé settings goes beyond the expected.

settings.title: The Pavé — Thin
settings.content: Dramatic, dreamy, yet modern. Your diamond is stunningly set above a delicate band of micro diamonds. A 4-prong cathedral setting is the perfect setup for this very sophisticated and understated take on pavé.

settings.title: The Pavé — Signature
settings.content: A mirrored pavé band creates a gorgeous, symmetrical base for your diamond. It is a commanding ring that confidently cradles your stone with a 6-prong setting. Art Deco lovers and heirloom collectors will admire the construction and peekaboo pavé feature on the side of the band.

settings.title: The Pavé — Tapered
settings.content: This ring is pure romance, embodied. With a 4-prong cathedral setting, your stone will sit at a lower profile, while allowing for maximum light to enter. An elegant taper of pavé stones sets the perfect stage for your diamond, in a whimsical manner that will always impress.
